snippet.title: Thanksgiving Holiday Recipes: Wild Rice and Cranberry Salad
snippet.description: ... ... Wild Rice and Cranberry Salad ... This recipe serves 8 ... ... Ingredients: ... 1 cup of uncooked wild rice ... 1 bag of fresh cranberries ... 1/4 cup of orange juice ... 1 tablespoon lemon juice ... 1/4 cup of sugar ... 1/2 cup chopped walnuts ... ... Cooking Instructions: ... 1. Cook the wild rice according to directions. When cooked, run under cold water. ... ... 2. While the rice is cooking, boil the orange juice, lemon juice and sugar in a saucepan. Let the mixture boil for 1 minute, turn to a simmer and add the cranberries. Stir while cooking. When the cranberries start to pop, remove from the heat. ... ... 3. When the rice is cooked, mix with the cranberry mixture and put in the refrigerator. Garnsih with walnuts when ready to serve. ... ... Nutrition Information: ... Per serving (8 servings total) ... Calori... ...

Directions: ... Wash and grate the carrot. Finely chop the celery. Peel and chop the onion. ... Heat a frying pan or iron skillet over medium heat. Add the oil, coating the bottom. snippet.title: Winter Vegetable Rice
snippet.description: ... ... Winter Vegetable Rice . It can be a challenge in the winter to eat as many vegetables as we know we should. Serving this side dish is a great way to add veggies to any meal. ... ... Ingredients : 2 Tbs. olive oil 1 clove garlic (chopped) (if tolerated) 1 medium zucchini 1 cup frozen peas 1 bag instant rice (white or brown) 1 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. freshly ground black pepper 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese (rice cheese also works well) ... ... Directions : Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and zucchini and sauté until translucent but not brown (if garlic is not tolerated, just saut... ...

snippet.title: Heartburn Friendly Cooking: Chicken, Apple and Brown Rice Salad
snippet.description: ... ... Chicken, Apple and Brown Rice Salad. Many of us will be celebrating the end of summer this weekend with a picnic. If you are living with or caring for someone with acid reflux, try making this salad. It can be served cold so it makes a great "bring along" for a Labor Day celebration. ... ... Ingredients: - 2 cups chicken breast (shredded, cooked, and cooled) - 2 medium green apples (thinly sliced) - 2 bags instant brown rice - 1/3 toasted walnuts (coarsely chopped) - 6 Tbs. balsamic vinaigrette - 1 Tbs. fresh parsley if tolerated - salt and pepper for seasoning if tolerated ... ...

snippet.title: Sticky Rice with Fresh Mangoes
snippet.description: ... ... Sticky Rice with Fresh Mangoes. I tried this dessert for the first time last week at a Tai restaurant. It is so sweet, but somehow feels light and refreshing. ... ... Ingredients: ... 1 cup coconut milk ... 1 tsp. salt ... 1 cup sticky rice ... 1 cup of warm water ... 2 Tbs. sugar ... 1 mango, peeled and sliced ... ... Directions: ... Sticky rice is traditionally steamed, but for those of us short on time, a microwave also works. ... ... Soak the sticky rice for 10 minutes in the warm water in a bowl (make sure the rice is covered by the water). Cover the bowl with a dish and cook in the microwave for about th... ...

snippet.title: Reflux Friendly Cooking: Yummy Shrimp and Rice
snippet.description: ... ... Reflux Friendly Cooking: Yummy Shrimp and Rice ... ... Reflux Friendly Cooking is a weekly feature that will be full of quick and easy food ideas that are acid reflux friendly and can be easily modified to meet the needs of everyone in your family! Each week I’ll provide a simple menu that is designed for easy digestion. I’ll also give you suggestions on how to modify the same recipe for others in your family without acid reflux disease. Bon Appétit! ... ... Yummy Shrimp and Rice . ... There are a lot of ways to eat shrimp and rice, but this one-skillet-wonder is reflux-friendly, really packs in the nutrients and tastes great. Let’s just say there were no leftovers! ... ... Ingredients: ... 1 Tbs olive oil ... 1/2 onion, chopped ... 1 1/2 Tbs fresh grated ginger ... 1 clove garlic, finely chopped ... 2 bags instant rice ... 1 lb medium peeled and deveined shrimp (frozen and thawed works fine) ... 1 cup frozen peas (thawed) ... 2 cups fresh baby spinach ... salt and pepper to taste ... ... Directi... ...

snippet.title: Low-Fat Holiday Recipe: Ham and Pumpkin Pirlau
snippet.description: ... ... Ham and Pumpkin Pirlau Recipe by: Frank Stitt, Highlands Bar & Grill, Birmingham, AL ... This recipe serves: 4 ... snippet.title: An Allergy-Free Halloween Treat Recipe
snippet.description: ... ... Chocolate Dipped Crispy Rice and Marshmallow Treats ... 6 cups puffed rice cereal* ... Non-stick cooking spray ... 1 ½ tablespoons canola oil ... 40 large egg-free marshmallows (I used Publix Brand**) ... 1 teaspoon Meraby’s gluten free vanilla extract ... 1 cup dairy-free chocolate chips (I used Enjoy Life Brand ) ... ... Place puffed rice cereal in a large bowl and set aside. Spray a large cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray and line the bottom with parchment paper and set aside. ...
